twin set (ithaliya), ooaaren intanashanal (eksath rajadhaniya), marks and spensar (bangla deshaya), harp tekstayil (eksath arabi emir rajyaya), asmara aparals (indiyawa), wiayipi klothin (indiyawa), trigar jins (indiyawa), arwind layipstayil brand (indiyawa), harma (honkon), kris gamants and weyar ( nayijiriya), fu hsunfayibar inadastris (thayiwan) saha hun thinfu (wiyatnamaya) wani ratawal saha kalapa 15 kin samagam 200 ka redi pili wyawasayakayan saha nishpadakayan boho sankhyawak aakarshanaya karaganimin 2018 di inteks sawuth eeshiya 4 wana mudranaya sampurna welanda pradarshanayak saha wyapara thorathuru labaganime samuluwak bawata pathwi nawinathama kapu redi, nimi andum redi, denim redi, andum masimata ganna upanga saha aashritha sewa ekama sthanayakadi labaganimata awasthawa salasayi.

thewaladam boho igena gena anunata deshana karamin danum pramanayen deshana karana namuth dharmanudharma prathipadawehi noyedi piliweth nopurana pramada wu thanaththa anunge harak balana gopallan men shramana ganayata himikarayek nowanne ya.yam bhikshuwak thewala dahamin haki pamana igena gena danum pramanayen desana dharmanudharma prathipadawehi yedena raga, dosha, moha durukota sihi nuwanin keles nasu sithin melowa paralowa aathmiya upadanayen midi wasaya karayi da ema bhikshuwa shramana ganayata himi karayek wanne ya.anunge gawayan bala ganna gopallata pasgo rasa labime wasanawak nomaththe ya.

me kathawa gethenne prabhu dewa wata nisamada manda me chithrapatiyata asamanya jiwayak thiyenawa kiyala mata hithenawa.chithrapatiya patan ganne gan ekak niwaduwakata awith pissu kelina thanakin meyala godak kal indan hari apuru yaluwo pas denek kollo hathara denekta eka hoda yalu kellek, habayi me pas denatama katha karannawath,kan ahennewath na kiyala chithrapatiya balana kenekta watahenna winadi 15withara yanawa.meyala ekathu wela.

eksath jathika pakshaye sirikotha mulasthanaya idiripita margaya kapat athirimata piyawara gaththe hadisiyedayi soya balana lesa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha adala ansha wetha niyoga kara athayi rajaye madhya prakashaka, prawruththi ha janamadhya amathi keheliya rambaukwalla mahatha pawasayi.sirikotha idiripita margaya kapat athirime kisidu waradak nathi wuwada ee sandaha hadisiyak thibune nam ee kumakata dayi soya baliya yuthuwa athayida amathiwaraya pawasiya.amathi mandala thirana danum dime madhya hamuwedi me sambandhayen mathu karunu prashnayakata pilithuru demin amathiwaraya me bawa pawasiya.amathi mandala thirana danum dime madhya hamuwa rajaye prawruththi departhamenthu shrawanagaraye eeye (18) pawathwini.
